name: nativescript-loading-indicator
description: A NativeScript plugin for showing an overlayed loading indicator.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-loading-indicator; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
